Interactive Virtual Reality Experience: Create an immersive virtual reality experience where users can place their real hand inside a virtual rubber hand. The virtual hand will mimic the movements of the user's real hand, creating a dissociation between the user's physical body and their sense of self. Users can interact with virtual objects using their virtual hand, creating a surreal and disorienting experience.

Augmented Reality Mirror: Develop an augmented reality mirror that projects a virtual rubber hand onto the user's real hand. The mirror will use sensors to track the user's hand movements and adjust the virtual hand's position in real-time, creating a seamless and interactive experience. Users can practice yoga or other hand exercises in front of the mirror, with the virtual hand providing feedback on their form and alignment.

Sensory Deprivation Tank: Design a sensory deprivation tank that simulates the feeling of having a rubber hand. The tank will use a combination of sound, light, and temperature to create a disorienting and immersive environment. Users will be able to relax and let go of their physical body, experiencing a sense of detachment and weightlessness.

Art Installation: Create an art installation that features a life-sized rubber hand on a rotating platform. The hand will be covered in LED lights that change color and pattern as it rotates, creating a mesmerizing and hypnotic effect. Visitors can stand in front of the installation and interact with the hand, creating a surreal and immersive experience.

Performance Art Piece: Develop a performance art piece that involves a live actor wearing a rubber hand and performing a series of movements and gestures. The actor will be dressed in a futuristic costume and will interact with a live audience, creating a surreal and unsettling experience. The performance will explore themes of identity, dissociation, and the blurring of boundaries between the physical and digital worlds.
